byline.original: By EVELYN M. RUSLI and MICHAEL J. DE LA MERCED

abstract: With senior employees rushing for the exits, the embattled online media company is eager to sign a deal and calm its ranks.
snippet: With senior employees rushing for the exits, the embattled online media company is eager to sign a deal and calm its ranks.

headline.main: As It Loses Executives, Yahoo Seeks a Deal
headline.print_headline: As It Loses Executives, Yahoo Seeks a Deal
